original_text: Again, when I say unto the wicked, Thou shalt surely die; if he turn from his sin, and do that which is lawful and right;
korean_text: 가령 내가 악인에게 말하기를 너는 죽으리라 하였다 하자 그가 돌이켜 자기의 죄에서 떠나서 정의와 공의로 행하여

sentences.original_text: Again, when I say unto the wicked,
if he turn from his sin,
and do that which is lawful and right;
